headline: Daiwa Cuts Applied Materials (AMAT) Rating to Neutral, Lowers PT to $170
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the Must-Watch AI Stocks for Investors. On August 20, Daiwa Securities analyst Louis Miscioscia downgraded the stock from Outperform to Neutral with a price target of $170.00 (from $185.00). The firm contended that AMAT’s quarterly results have been below its expectations due to weak trends in semiconductor equipment spending, […]
